mapper.sql: id, category_id, name, subtitle, main_image, sub_images, detail, price, stock, status, createtime, updatetime
mapper.update:
update product
category_id=#{categoryId},
name=#{name},
subtitle=#{subtitle},
price=#{price},
stock=#{stock},
status=#{status},
createTime=#{createTime},
updateTime=#{updateTime},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id,c.name AS category_name,p.name,p.subtitle,p.main_image,p.price,p.stock,p.status,p.createtime,p.updatetime FROM product AS p INNER JOIN category AS c ON p.category_id=c.id limit #{index},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into product (id,category_id,name,subtitle, main_image,sub_images,detail, price,stock,status,createtime,updatetime) values (#{id},#{categoryId},#{name},#{subtitle},#{mainImage},#{subImages},#{detail},#{price},#{stock},#{status},now(),now())
